Package control

Interface PetrinetPanelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
PetrinetPanel
public interface PetrinetPanelInterface

An interface for a JPanel presenting a Petrinet with its according reachability graph loaded from a file. It serves on the one hand as a intermediary between the main controller and the petrinet controller and on the other mediates clicks on the PetrinetGraph between the PetrinetViewerController and the PetrinetEditorController. According to the ToolbarMode it is currently set to.

    • getToolbarMode

    • getPetrinetViewerController

      Gets the petrinet controller.
      Returns:
      the petrinet controller

    • setToolbarMode

      void setToolbarMode(ToolbarMode toolbarMode)
      Sets the toolbar mode. If it changes to EDITOR resets the reachability graph. If it changes to VIEWER handles marked transitions (since transitions cannot be marked in VIEWER mode).
      Parameters:
      toolbarMode - the toolbar mode to use

    • getEditor

    • getAnalyser

      PetrinetAnalyser getAnalyser()
      Analyses whether the current petrinet is bounded or unbounded. In the process also adjusts the arrow heads in the GraphStream graph.
      Returns:
      a petrinet analyser
